events.text:
YAYYY, YOU FOUND US!
You win Hide & Seek!

Although, we think human should LOSE for how many times it was wrong. Very pathetic.
Doesn't human follow instructions anymore?
Oh well!

So spiders lied about not having any food... we are actually sorry about this.
We also lied about eating human... we DO eat human but it won Hide & Seek! 
So we'd like to give you human food and a bottle of [color=#7cff65]Moss Begone[/color] as a prize for winning!
YAY! Go touch the moss with [color=#7cff65]Moss Begone[/color] to claim your prize, human.
Oh, we also found a weird [color=#ff0000]Jar[/color] when we were stealing apples from your cellar.
That [color=#ff0000]Jar[/color] is not very tasty! Human can have it!!!
